dk.cit.fyp.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.cit.fyp.controller.MainController

  • @Controller
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Primary controller of Betting Application. Performs background processing, orchestrates data, serves interfaces.
    Author:
    Dave Kavanagh

      • translate

        @RequestMapping(value="/translate",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String translate(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                     java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                     Bet tempBet,
                                                                                                     Race tempRace,
                                                                                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Process translation of bet, verifying fields and saving to the database.
        Parameters:
        model - Model object used to pass data to client side for display.
        principal - Principal object user to obtain logged in user details.
        tempBet - Bet object to be translated and saved to DB
        tempRace - Race object used to aid translation.
        bindingResult - BindingResult object used to validate errors.
        Returns:
        Redirect to translate page once done.

      • uploadImage

        @RequestMapping(value="/upload",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String uploadImage(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                    java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam
                                                                                                    org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file,
                                                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        This function retrieves an image from a POST, saves the image to file-system and returns the encoded image to be displayed on the front-end. The image is then saved to the database as a new bet.
        Parameters:
        model - Model object used to pass data to client side for display.
        principal - Principal object user to obtain logged in user details.
        file - Multipart file object used to retrieve selected file.
        session - HTTPSession object.
        attributes - RedirectAttributes object used to pass error message.
        Returns:

      • confirmUpload

        @RequestMapping(value="/confirmUpload",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String confirmUpload(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                             java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                             Bet bet,
                                                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                             org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        Used to process uploaded image, saving new bet to database.
        Parameters:
        model - Model object used to pass data to client side for display.
        principal - Principal object user to obtain logged in user details.
        bet - New Bet object to be added and saved to database.
        bindingResult - BindingResult object used to validate errors.
        attributes - RedirectAttributes object used to pass error message.
        Returns:
        Redirect to upload page.

      • addUser

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/users",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addUser(User user,
                                                                                                                                                org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        Process addition of new system user and saves to database.
        Parameters:
        user - User to be added to database.
        attributes - RedirectAttributes object used to pass error message.
        Returns:
        Redirect to admin interface, tab 3.

      • addHorses

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/races",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addHorses(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                  java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                  Race tempRace,
                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Return horses interface for adding horses to a new race.
        Parameters:
        model - Model object used to pass data to client side for display.
        principal - Principal object user to obtain logged in user details.
        tempRace - Race object that indicates the number of runners.
        bindingResult - BindingResult object used to validate errors.
        Returns:
        Add horses interface.

      • addRace

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/races/add",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addRace(RaceWrapper wrapper,
                                                                                                                                                    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        Process addition of new race and save to database.
        Parameters:
        wrapper - RaceWrapper object used to manage Race object and List of Horse objects.
        attributes - RedirectAttributes object used to pass error message.
        Returns:
        Redirect to admin interface, tab 2.

      • viewRace

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/races/{raceID}",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String viewRace(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                         java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="raceID")
                                                                                                                                                         int raceID)
        Load Race details interface to facilitate 'settling' of race.
        Parameters:
        model - Model object used to pass data to client side for display.
        principal - Principal object user to obtain logged in user details.
        raceID - integer value representing the ID of the race to be settled.
        Returns:
        Race details interface.

      • settleRace

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/races/{raceID}",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String settleRace(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                            org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes,
                                                                                                                                                            @PathVariable(value="raceID")
                                                                                                                                                            int raceID,
                                                                                                                                                            RaceWrapper wrapper)
        Process 'settling' of race. Save details to database.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest used to obtain hidden input fields.
        attributes - RedirectAttributes object used to pass error message.
        raceID - integer value representing the ID of the race to be settled.
        wrapper - RaceWrapper object used to manage Race object and List of Horse objects.
        Returns:
        Redirect to admin interface.
